script: SetTooltip ngcFilgapLuddic "A small expedition sponsorized by Jangola Luddic Church to rediscover the beauty of creation. .\n\nIncludes Luddic Path and Knights ships to put down Domain aberration."
options: 6:ngcFilgapLuddic:An unofficial Luddic crusader, leading a small exploration fleet (faster start)

script:
